definitions.definition: Having a pH less than 7, or being sour , or having the strength to neutralize alkalis , or turning a litmus paper red.
Containing a high percentage of silica -bearing minerals; opposed to basic .
Of or relating to acid ; having the character of an acid.

main_definition: ( chemistry ) Having a pH less than 7, or being sour , or having the strength to neutralize alkalis , or turning a litmus paper red.
secondary_definitions: ( petrology ) Containing a high percentage of silica -bearing minerals; opposed to basic .
Of or relating to acid ; having the character of an acid.
